Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Select Expand view in the wallet menu.
Expected Result:
A new tab opens.
The expanded extension view is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to open the Accounts options menu.
Expected Result: The accounts menu popover is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to Contacts in the Settings menu.

Expected Result: The New contact screen is displayed.
The newly added contact appears in the contact list.

The contact's username is displayed.
The contact's public address is displayed.
